message.content: {"given_definition_quality":70,"better_definition":"most; to the highest degree","sentence":"我最喜欢唱歌。","image_prompt":"A cheerful child singing with a bright smile, standing on a simple stage. Emphasize the child's happy face, microphone in hand, with a few faint musical notes floating around.","sentence_translation":"I like singing the most."}
